## About Me
My name is **Harnoor Kaur** and I am an MSc Economics candidate at the London School of Economics and Political Science. My academic interests lie in environmental economics, political economy, applied microeconomics, and econometrics. In my free time, I enjoy hiking and reading.

## About the Project
**Title**: *How does Fuel Efficiency relate to Vehicle Weight?*

**Description**: In this project, we will be looking at the association between fuel efficiency of vehicles and their vehicle weight.

### Goals
- Present a graph
- Summarize relevant literature on the topic
  + This may require qualitative and anecdotal evidence
